.. py:module:: ethereum.istanbul.vm.precompiled_contracts.alt_bn128

Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) ALT_BN128 CONTRACTS
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

.. contents:: Table of Contents
    :backlinks: none
    :local:

Introduction
------------

Implementation of the ALT_BN128 precompiled contracts.


.. only:: stage1

---------------
